meanings.definition: The quality of being toxic to cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytotoxicities of the medication were evident in the lab results.
meanings.sent2: Exposure to certain chemicals can lead to cytotoxicities in the body.
meanings.sent3: The cytotoxicities of the new cleaning product were so strong that even the bacteria ran away!
meanings.sent4: The cytotoxicities of the chemotherapy drugs waged a war against the cancer cells.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the cytotoxicities under the microscope, revealing their destructive power.

meanings.definition: The state of being harmful to living cells.
meanings.sent1: Doctors closely monitor the patient for any signs of cytotoxicities after treatment.
meanings.sent2: The cytotoxicities caused by the virus were a major concern for the researchers.
meanings.sent3: The cytotoxicities of the sun's rays on fair skin were like a silent enemy waiting to strike.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against disease, the immune system must recognize and eliminate cytotoxicities.
meanings.sent5: The cytotoxicities of the poison dart frog's skin serve as a defense mechanism in the wild.
